Package com.nerjal.json.parser

This package provides all the required tools to properly parse any string or file to JSON and vice-versa.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ParserState
    The interface for all the states used by the StringParser class in order to parse a string.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractState
    Abstract class stating some final overrides for methods which don't need any more from ParserState, as well as default overrides for a cleaner parsing states code.
    Also sets links to the parser and its older state.
    ArrayState
    The StringParser JSON array parsing state class.
    Can hold other elements, in order to fill in the parsed array.
    CommentState
    The StringParser JSON comment parsing state class.
    Cannot hold other elements.
    Closing depends on the comment type: In-line comment: closes on line break Block comment: closes on */
    EmptyState
    The StringParser JSON root parsing state class.
    Can hold one other element, to be the one returned by the parser.
    Closes at the end of the parsed string.
    FileParser
    A parser to get a JSON5 structure from a file
    NumberState
    The StringParser JSON number parsing state class.
    Cannot hold other elements
    Closes on any not corresponding char.
    ObjectState
    The StringParser JSON object parsing state class.
    Can hold other elements, in order to fill in the parsed object.
    StringParser
    A parser to get a JSON5 structure from a string
    StringState
    The StringParser JSON string parsing state class.
    Cannot hold other elements
    Depending on the state opening char, and therefore the string quoting, closes on either ' or "

Package com.nerjal.json.parser Description

This package provides all the required tools to properly parse any string or file to JSON and vice-versa. All of this package's classes are meant to be by, and only by, the StringParser class.
All of this package's functionalities can also be used easily with the JsonParser class' methods. See the com.nerjal.json.parser.options package for more info about stringification options.
